name: Holo-Hosting-App_GUI
description: The hosting app is a space for Hosts and App Providers to interact

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./HoloHostingApp && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.8:40867/?a=hkauWw0c4cH_8wkJNDNrMr4ZOyZWs-vcb-JsKVbzo6IdW73y6Pu1D6jDC7dBbjjyfjp172gjbhh-zfVUgNeHa0dYAXaOAVv2 HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:33999/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/zo-el/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
